title: Ep135: Homemade Sex Toys, Top Kinks & Dating Woes feat Assante
itunes:title: Ep135: Homemade Sex Toys, Top Kinks & Dating Woes feat Assante
description:
This week the duo are joined by friend of the show and resident gay Assante, 1/3 of the Friend Zone podcast and host of If I Were a Rapper Podcast. Mandii and Weezy update on some wild outings recently and Assante spills the tea on how Mandii is enjoying the hell out of all the gay male clubs in the city. The three discuss homemade sex toys and more. Can you guess the top 5 kinks in the US? Mandii puts Assante and Weezy to the test. Find out which kinks reign supreme. The Whoreible Decision this week we discuss communication during the "just dating" phase. Follow this week's guest on all social media platforms @heyassante and subscribe and check out The Friend Zone Podcast and If I Were a Rapper Podcast Shoutout to this week's sponsors: Save 30% off on your first month's subscription at mylola.com using Promocode:WDP30 Save 33% on your online order at voodoo.toys using Promocode: DECISIONS33 PHILLY! DC! BOSTON! The time is now to get your tickets for the Whoreible Decisions North America Tour at whoreibledecisions.com Pre-sale tickets along with 50+ bonus episodes are available at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions ! Subscribe now and become a Patron!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
